item.title: Veteran Trader Peter Brandt Hints S&P 500 Is Experiencing Exhaustion Gap
item.description: Brandt flagged the exhaustion gap beyond the 6,841.25 level

item.title: ONDS Stock Rises Following Acquisition Of Israel-Based Sentry CS
item.description: Ondas expects the transaction to close in November 2025, and the terms of the deal have not been disclosed.

item.title: Scott Bessent Says NVIDIA’s Blackwell Chips May Qualify For China Export As Advanced Models Emerge
item.description: During an interview with CNBC, Bessent noted that Blackwell chips could fall several generations behind as chip technology continues to evolve.

item.title: Elon Musk’s $1T Pay Package Gets A Thumbs Up From Baron Capital
item.description: Baron Capital has been investing in Tesla since 2024 and will be voting for the package.

item.title: Alex Karp Calls Out Michael Burry’s Short Bet Against Palantir, Nvidia: Report
item.description: During an interview with CNBC, Karp expressed surprise about the fact that the ‘Big Short’ legend was betting that Palantir and Nvidia would not perfo...
